title: Cylinder head, check for plane surface

steps.text: Remove gasket residue and clean sealing surfaces. No sharp-edged tools may be used when cleaning. Ensure that the cylinder head sealing surface is not damaged.
Note: For diesel engines the glow plugs and if necessary the swirl chambers must be removed.
Using a straightedge, check the cylinder head for flexion lengthways and widthways and for distortion in the diagonal.
